phrases: Once upon a time, there was a man who died.
The prince and the raven from the man's story escaped from the story and fought.
Their battle ended with the prince taking out his own heart and sealing the raven away by using its forbidden power.
The prince, who had lost his heart, met a duck in a certain town.
Because of her love for the prince, the duck turned into a princess and gathered together the lost shards of his heart.
The prince gradually regained his feelings, and at long last, he was able to regain even the feeling of love.
And they lived happily ever after.
After all, the princess is fated to turn into a speck of light and vanish
the moment she tells the prince of her love for him.
Oh, that is right, the prince was able to turn back to being a prince.
I... I am just a duck now and...
I am dancing a pas de deux with the prince.
Not as Princess Tutu, but as me, a normal girl.
Oh, good, that was just a dream.
Sheesh, what the heck am I thinking about?!
Really, all you guys ever think about is food.
Hey, did you know I am Princess Tutu?
I am a prima donna who rescues the prince.
Well, not that it really matters.
It is been a week since then.
I wonder if his wounds have healed.
You do not have to panic THAT much.
But anyway, we are going on ahead!
It really does feel like I am still just Ahiru.
She is definitely not Princess Kraehe, right?
It was finally getting better, but seeing your face has made it start throbbing with pain.
She was worried because you were not in school for a whole week.
That is not a nice way to talk to her, Fakir.
Will you keep being friendly with me?
You are the only friend I have that I can tell everything to.
I am hiding the fact that I am Princess Tutu from Mytho.
And that I am a duck too.
I have to tell him, do not I?
Um, I... Well, the truth is...
No, maybe it is a crocodile?
And Princess Tutu and a crocodile are totally different anyway, Fakir.
Maybe I was just imagining things.
I really thought I saw a flying cow, but...
She probably did not like the way I talked to her and went on ahead.
You have to be nicer to girls, Fakir.
What do you think of Princess Tutu?
Why are you asking me so suddenly?
She always disappears after she returns a piece of your heart.
Do you want to know who she really is?
But maybe right now it is best for me not to know.
Because I am sure she will tell me someday.
Right now, I think it is more important to get all of my feelings back as soon as possible,
You will help me too, will not you, Fakir?
Well, I am technically a knight, after all.
I was sure you would say that, Fakir.
And then, I will go back into the story.
That is what you want, then?
Yes, because I am the prince in the story.
Cat-sensei will be angry at us if we are late.
You give me a lot of trouble.
You can just be late and have Cat-sensei get mad at you!
Could he have done that on purpose so I could hear what Mytho said?
That is you, is not it?
I left the dorm at the same time as always,
but on my way here, a crocodile and a cow were flying in the sky and...
Ahiru-san, you act like you own the place, as usual.
You are just like the students in the advanced class.
Oh, no, I do not think I am that great.
If you keep coming to my class late, I will have to either drop you to the probationary class again...
Look how hard she is trying!
The probationary class is one thing, but just do not make her marry you!
I am so glad I got to hear what he had to say.
I have to try even harder until I get back all the pieces of Mytho's heart.
I do not know what you are talking about, but you have to try your best!
Now, you try your best and hardest, and fail spectacularly, okay?
But they will not continue forever, you know.
That is what is so great about stories.
In ballet, the most important thing is practice.
The second most important thing is practice.
Three, four, and five are practice too.
Why exactly do we practice, then?
We do it to master the basics.
Today, I am going to tell you a story.
Listen carefully WITHOUT letting your eyes wander!
That is right, this was back when I was a student in ballet school...
I happened to get the chance to observe Meowzinsky-sensei practicing.
You do not know anything, do you?
It was when we ballet students were helping out with a performance of Meowzinsky-sensei's.
I was still only a year and three months old, a cheeky youth.
Yes, it was Meowzinsky-sensei himself, the man renowned as a genius
for his novel choreography and his jumps that people called miraculous.
But that day, all Meowzinsky-sensei did was just slowly, very slowly, practice the basics over and over again.
Before I knew it, I found myself asking him questions.
I thought a dancer as famous as you would have a more special practice routine, I said.
This is how he answered me...
Someone who has not mastered the basics cannot achieve advanced techniques or a noble spirit.
These shoes were given to me on that very day by Meowzinsky-sensei.
And I swore on these shoes that I would dedicate my life to ballet.
So basically he is saying, Practice the basics diligently.
But I think some people will never improve no matter how hard they practice the basics, so do not let it get to you!
These shoes have suffered a lot of wear and tear, but to me, they are the most beautiful shoes in the world.
I wonder what is wrong with Mytho...
Where did you go after you disappeared from class so suddenly?
I started to feel sick, and after that...
You can want to go back to being the prince, but that does not make it possible.
Is that what you are saying?
Say, Fakir, I have something to tell you.
I trust you have firmly engraved Meowzinsky-sensei's words in your minds?
Even if they diligently practice the basics, people who are not going to get good will never get good, so...
Wait, how did that go again?
Anyway, be on time for class tomorrow.
But I do not think I can do it.
Well, no need to let it get to you too much.
Being late is an essential part of your charm!
What was that scream just now?
Oh, that Ahiru does not even disguise her curiosity!
It is Ahiru's fault, is not it?
Why cannot I get Mytho out of my mind?
Something going on with him lately?
He is been holed up in there forever!
Does seem like he is researching.
Do not tell anyone we told you!
It is not like we are into being nosy.
What is Fakir doing in the library?
No, right now, finding Mytho comes first.
I wonder if there is a huge commotion right about now.
The shoes filled with beautiful memories and dreams...
It is funny, is not it, Fakir?
The raven's blood you gave me...
It looks like it is begun to exercise its power.
I see, my blood that you soaked the prince's feeling of love with...
I am so glad I did just like you told me to, Father.
The only thing I ever wish for is my dear daughter's happiness.
The prince will keep changing, will not he?
Into a prince who loves crows.
And he will marry you and become my son.
Will you intend to pierce my heart with the sword again?
But that sword is gone now, is not it?
It is not scary, it is not scary...
Even though I have finally regained my emotions?
Your heart is not whole yet.
I have to hurry and get the whole thing back...
maybe I will try offering it to a crow.
Fakir, I will tell you right now.
At last, the second act has begun!
The knight, the prince, and the two princesses...
It seems their roles will change just a bit.
I am looking forward to it, Princess Tutu.
Did not Mytho fall in love with Pike?
It is none of your business if Mytho-sama and I are dating.
What did you do to Mytho?!
The prince is going to change.
He will love only me, and he will find a young and beautiful heart for my father and offer it to him.
You will give me your beautiful heart, will not you?
All you children who love stories, come gather around.
The voice calling, come now, wake up
The brilliant light and the dew on trees are born
By the secret water's edge that no one knows of
Dance the pas de deux of life
It is a gentle, yet fierce current
How far does the labyrinth stretch?
I loved like I was dreaming
I thought how wonderful it was to be alive
I want to be there for you
Passing by even the wind and the rain clouds
